comment: I loathe professor Miley. She is by far the worst professor at KSU. She is impossible to reach by email, shuts down the materials making it impossible to review, has unclear grading material, and assigns so many papers. I have so many more negative things I could say but unfortunately the word limit won't let me. Take someone else for your own good
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lots of homework--So many papers

comment: She was okay when I met her over a video call but on email, it was an entirely different story.  She also randomly expects full-length papers out of the blue. This was my first introduction to learning ASL formally and it left a bad taste in my mouth. Maybe she'd be better in person but online is a no go -1/10 would not do again

Dropped this course halfway thru. It was so hard to get in touch with her as she would not respond to emails. Also, almost weekly, you would have to write a 1-2 page paper, single spaced and cited, about a video about deaf news which I found overkill as there was not that much to talk about. Uploaded ASL vids with no context. Don't take her.
